A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A short summary of the film is Rey meets Luke\, nothing happens\, space chase\, useless casino scene\, Kylo Ren turns into a whiny crybaby\, nothing happens\, they kill off a beloved character for no reason other than to enforce the female lead\, end. Honestly\, this isn't the worst Star Wars film\, but it's down there with the trash. Boring\, bland\, generic\, and cliché.
